name: Tentacles Invasion
summary: On the way back to Earth, the space freighter Nostromo 2 encounters an emergency, and crew member Veronica Wenger is awakened from cryosleep. The ship is infested with mysterious creatures, and there is no communication with the other 9 crew members. In response to the computer "HOLLY9000," Veronica embarks on a mission to save her fellow crewmates.
